item.description:
BEACH WALK IN NAHANT
Walk along the beach from Swampscott to Nahant. Bring lunch or buy food at Tides restaurant in Nahant. We will be eating on the beach.

Trip's Coordinator: Naomi at naomi.allen07@gmail.com or (617) 277-9968 (til 9:45 pm) Cell on day of trip: 857-540-6458
RSVP: Preferred but not required by August 8, 2009.
MEET: at Red Rock Bistro, 141 Humphrey Street, in Swampscott at 11:00 am.
COST: Bring money for lunch or beverage/food or ice cream afterwards, plus $5 for nonmembers.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION: Commuter Rail to the Swampscott is the quickest ride
from Boston and the 10:15 train out of North Station arrives at10:37. The Red Rock Bistro is only .6-mile walk from where you get off in Swampscott. (when you get off the train take a right onto Burrill st and follow it down to the water and the Red Rock Bistro). Buses: the 442 buses from Wonderland to Humphrey and Redington Street (1 stop after Monument Ave)is across the street from the Red Rock Bistro. The 441-bus stop is at the corner of Paradise road and Burrill Street .3 of a mile away.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to Naomi at naomi.allen07@gmail.com to make arrangements

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: BEACH WALK IN NAHANT
